name: Canada
interestingFact: In parts of Canada, milk is still sold in plastic bags instead of cartons or bottles.

name: Japan
interestingFact: In Japan, there are vending machines that sell everything from umbrellas to fresh eggs and even ties.

name: India
interestingFact: India has a floating post office located on Dal Lake in Srinagar, Kashmir.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: The city of Rio de Janeiro was once the capital of Portugal, making it the only European capital outside Europe.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia is home to pink lakes like Lake Hillier, whose color remains even if the water is bottled.

name: Egypt
interestingFact: Ancient Egyptians invented the first known pregnancy test using wheat and barley seeds.

name: France
interestingFact: There’s only one stop sign in the entire city of Paris.

name: South Africa
interestingFact: South Africa is the only country in the world to have hosted the FIFA World Cup, Rugby World Cup, and Cricket World Cup.

name: Italy
interestingFact: In Venice, there are more gondolas now for tourists than there ever were for local transport in history.
